class.name: Leaf
class.brief: This class holds anything related to the branch
class.doc: The only way to create a Leaf instance is from TreeWrapper ROOT::TreeWrapper::operator[].

methodtemplate.name: read
methodtemplate.brief: Register this branch for read access
methodtemplate.doc:
Register this branch for read access. The branch must exists in the tree and created to hold data of type T.
Internally, the `TTree::SetBranchAddress` method is called to read the branch. The status of the branch is also set to 1.

return.doc: a const reference to the data hold by this branch. The content is in read-only mode, and will change each time ROOT::TreeWrapper::next is called.

templatetypeparameter.name: T
templatetypeparameter.brief: Type of data this branch holds

methodtemplate.name: write
methodtemplate.brief: Register this branch for write access
methodtemplate.doc:
Register this branch for write access. A new branch will be created in the tree properly configured to hold data of type T.
Internally, the `TTree::Branch` method is called to create the new branch.

return.doc: a reference to the data hold by this branch. Change the content of this reference before calling ROOT::TreeWrapper::fill to change the branch data.

templatetypeparameter.name: T
templatetypeparameter.brief: Type of data this branch holds
